items.title: Cardiff Oncology: Pioneering RAS-Mutated Cancer Therapies With Onvansertib
Want Decades of Passive Income? Buy This ETF and Hold It Forever.
items.author: Selena Maranjian
items.description: The article discusses the benefits of dividend-paying stocks and ETFs, highlighting the Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF as a particularly compelling option due to its solid dividend yield, growing payouts, and low expense ratio.
